017package org.microbean.qualifier;
018
019import java.util.Map;
020
021import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
022import java.lang.constant.MethodTypeDesc;
023
024import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Map;
025import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Object;
026import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_String;
027
028import static java.lang.constant.DirectMethodHandleDesc.Kind.STATIC;
029
030import static org.microbean.qualifier.ConstantDescs.CD_Qualifier;
031
032/**
033 * A {@link Binding} used to qualify objects.
034 *
035 * <p>This is a <a
036 * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/doc-files/ValueBased.html">value-based</a>
037 * class.</p>
038 *
039 * @param <K> the type of a {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain
040 * #attributes() attribute keys}
041 *
042 * @param <V> the type of a {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain #value()
043 * value} and of its {@linkplain #attributes() attribute values}
044 *
045 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
046 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
047 *
048 * @see Binding
049 */
050public final class Qualifier<K extends Comparable<? super K>, V> extends Binding<K, V, Qualifier<K, V>> {
051
052
053  /*
054   * Constructors.
055   */
056
057
058  /**
059   * Creates a new {@link Qualifier}.
060   *
061   * @param name the name; must not be {@code null}
062   *
063   * @param value the value; may be {@code null}
064   *
065   * @param attributes further describing this {@link Qualifier}; may
066   * be {@code null}
067   *
068   * @param info informational attributes further describing this
069   * {@link Qualifier} that are not considered by its {@link
070   * #equals(Object)} implementation; may be {@code null}
071   *
072   * @see #name()
073   *
074   * @see #value()
075   *
076   * @see #attributes()
077   *
078   * @see #info()
079   *
080   * @see Binding#Binding(String, Object, Map, Map)
081   */
082  private Qualifier(final String name,
083                    final V value,
084                    final Map<? extends K, ? extends V> attributes,
085                    final Map<? extends K, ? extends V> info) {
086    super(name, value, attributes, info);
087  }
088
089
090  /*
091   * Instance methods.
092   */
093
094
095  /**
096   * Returns a {@link MethodHandleDesc} describing the constructor or
097   * {@code static} method that will be used to create a <a
098   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">dynamic
099   * constant</a> representing this {@link Qualifier}.
100   *
101   * <p>End users have no need to call this method.</p>
102   *
103   * @return a {@link MethodHandleDesc} describing the constructor or
104   * {@code static} method that will be used to create a <a
105   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">dynamic
106   * constant</a> representing this {@link Qualifier}
107   *
108   * @nullability This method does not return {@code null}.
109   *
110   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
111   *
112   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
113   * threads.
114   */
115  @Override // Binding<K, V, Qualifier<K, V>>
116  protected final MethodHandleDesc describeConstructor() {
117    return
118      MethodHandleDesc.ofMethod(STATIC,
119                                CD_Qualifier,
120                                "of",
121                                MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_Qualifier, CD_String, CD_Object, CD_Map, CD_Map));
122  }
123
124
125  /*
126   * Static methods.
127   */
128
129
130  /**
131   * Returns a {@link Qualifier}, which may or may not be newly
132   * created, representing the supplied arguments.
133   *
134   * @param <K> the type of the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain
135   * #attributes() attribute keys}
136   *
137   * @param <V> the type of the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain #value()
138   * value} and of its {@linkplain #attributes() attribute values}
139   *
140   * @param name the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain Qualifier#name()
141   * name}; must not be {@code null}
142   *
143   * @return a {@link Qualifier}
144   *
145   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
146   *
147   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
148   *
149   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
150   * threads.
151   */
152  public static final <K extends Comparable<? super K>, V> Qualifier<K, V> of(final String name) {
153    return of(name, null, null, null);
154  }
155
156  /**
157   * Returns a {@link Qualifier}, which may or may not be newly
158   * created, representing the supplied arguments.
159   *
160   * @param <K> the type of the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain
161   * #attributes() attribute keys}
162   *
163   * @param <V> the type of the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain #value()
164   * value} and of its {@linkplain #attributes() attribute values}
165   *
166   * @param name the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain Qualifier#name()
167   * name}; must not be {@code null}
168   *
169   * @param value the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain
170   * Qualifier#value() value}; may be {@code null}
171   *
172   * @return a {@link Qualifier}
173   *
174   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
175   *
176   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
177   *
178   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
179   * threads.
180   */
181  public static final <K extends Comparable<? super K>, V> Qualifier<K, V> of(final String name, final V value) {
182    return of(name, value, null, null);
183  }
184
185  /**
186   * Returns a {@link Qualifier}, which may or may not be newly
187   * created, representing the supplied arguments.
188   *
189   * @param <K> the type of the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain
190   * #attributes() attribute keys}
191   *
192   * @param <V> the type of the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain #value()
193   * value} and of its {@linkplain #attributes() attribute values}
194   *
195   * @param name the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain Qualifier#name()
196   * name}; must not be {@code null}
197   *
198   * @param value the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain
199   * Qualifier#value() value}; may be {@code null}
200   *
201   * @param attributes the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain
202   * Qualifier#attributes() attributes}; may be {@code null}
203   *
204   * @return a {@link Qualifier}
205   *
206   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
207   *
208   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
209   *
210   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
211   * threads.
212   */
213  public static final <K extends Comparable<? super K>, V> Qualifier<K, V> of(final String name,
214                                                                              final V value,
215                                                                              final Map<? extends K, ? extends V> attributes) {
216    return of(name, value, attributes, null);
217  }
218
219  /**
220   * Returns a {@link Qualifier}, which may or may not be newly
221   * created, representing the supplied arguments.
222   *
223   * @param <K> the type of the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain
224   * #attributes() attribute keys}
225   *
226   * @param <V> the type of the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain #value()
227   * value} and of its {@linkplain #attributes() attribute values}
228   *
229   * @param name the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain Qualifier#name()
230   * name}; must not be {@code null}
231   *
232   * @param value the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain
233   * Qualifier#value() value}; may be {@code null}
234   *
235   * @param attributes the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain
236   * Qualifier#attributes() attributes}; may be {@code null}
237   *
238   * @param info the {@link Qualifier}'s {@linkplain Qualifier#info()
239   * informational attributes}; may be {@code null}
240   *
241   * @return a {@link Qualifier}
242   *
243   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
244   *
245   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
246   *
247   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
248   * threads.
249   */
250  public static final <K extends Comparable<? super K>, V> Qualifier<K, V> of(final String name,
251                                                                              final V value,
252                                                                              final Map<? extends K, ? extends V> attributes,
253                                                                              final Map<? extends K, ? extends V> info) {
254    return new Qualifier<>(name, value, attributes, info);
255  }
256
257}
